attributes.action: Force Toys R Us to run their 1989 'Magical Place'  TV adverts over the Christmas period
attributes.additional_details:
I am not a Toys R Us kid, I want to visit the store that has toys in their millions all under one roof!

We petition Toys R Us to run their classic 1989 tv advert over the Christmas period. We believe it has a significant and important cultural impact at this time of year.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5qpEVl-Q-Ks&feature=youtube_gdata_player
